title: Melanie Griffith, 62, takes a smoking break while shopping at a farmer's market
text:
She just celebrated her eldest daughter's birthday on Friday.

And Melanie Griffith spent her Sunday shopping at a farmer's market in Los Angeles.

The 62-year-old rocked an 80's chic look for the outing and took a break to smoke a cigarette.

Market time: Melanie Griffith rocked an 80's chic look for the outing and took a break to smoke a cigarette, in LA on Saturday

The Working Girl actresses donned all black in leggings and a sleeves tee that read 'love first.'

She paired it with black slide on sandals and lace arms sleeves up to her elbows.

Melanie kept a cool look with her hair down in a simple sleek look and while wearing black cat eye sunglasses.

Chic: The Working Girl actresses donned all black in leggings and a sleeves tee that read 'love first'

The veteran actress also carried a black and beige purse on her right shoulder.

She chatted with a male friend during her smoke break.

On Friday she marked her daughter's milestone birthday with a celebratory Instagram post.

Birthday girl: On Friday she marked her daughter's milestone birthday with a celebratory Instagram post

Baby girl: She shares Dakota with her first husband Don Johnson. The actresses also shares a son, Alexander, with her second husband Steven Bauer, and daughter Stella Banderas with her ex Antonio Banderas

'My Coqui,' her post read. 'Happy birthday my beautiful girl! I am honored to be your mama.'

Melanie continued: 'So so proud of you! I love you with all of my heart.'

She shares Dakota with her first husband Don Johnson.

The actresses also shares a son, Alexander, with her second husband Steven Bauer, and daughter Stella Banderas with her ex Antonio Banderas.
